jobDescription: Position Description: -Develop data processes scripts Perform data analysis with existing and newly developed scripts. Skills Required: -Writing and executing Matlab scripts. -Write algorithms for processing large data sets. -Microsoft Word and Microsoft Excel proficiency. Skills Preferred: -Knowledge of high voltage battery systems and hybrid/electrical vehicle systems Experience Required: -3 or more months of prior product validation or development testing experience. -Experience processing large data sets. -Practical Knowledge of test planning, instrumentation, and setup Education Required: -High school diploma and/or trade school degree. Education Preferred: -Associates degree or higher.
